en.name: Muni Besen Ferreira
en.profile: Highly skilled software developer with over 7 years of experience in Python, C++, C#, and JavaScript. Proven track record in developing robust web applications using Django, Flask, React and Vue.js, with expertise in PostgreSQL and SQLite, web scraping, ChatGPT integrations, and cybersecurity. Seeking opportunities to leverage my extensive experience and skills in software development and cybersecurity.

pt.name: Muni Besen Ferreira

Buscando oportunidades para aproveitar minha extensa experiência e habilidades em desenvolvimento de software e cibersegurança.

en.description: Working as a Software Developer at Tributo Devido, a fintech company, where I contribute to building scalable and secure financial technology solutions. My role encompasses full-stack development, DevOps practices, and system architecture design.
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining microservices and monolithic applications using Python, Django, FastAPI, and React
Implementing automation solutions using Playwright for testing and process optimization
Designing and managing cloud infrastructure on AWS (EC2, Lambda, EKS, S3, CloudWatch)
Setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and deployment
Integrating LLM and AI solutions to enhance system capabilities
Managing containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes
Implementing responsive frontend designs using Bootstrap, TypeScript, and modern CSS
Developing RESTful APIs and ensuring system scalability
Performing data modeling and database optimization with PostgreSQL
Implementing monitoring and error tracking using Sentry
Contributing to DevOps practices and infrastructure as code
Working with cross-platform development (Linux and Windows environments)
en.tech_stack: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Django, FastAPI, React, Bootstrap, Playwright, AWS (EC2, Lambda, EKS, S3, CloudWatch), Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Sentry, Git, CI/CD, REST APIs, Shell Scripting, Node.js, Java, Rust, HTML5, CSS3

en.description: With over 7 years of experience as a freelancer, I have a strong background in Python, C++, C#, JavaScript, React, and Vue.js. My expertise extends to the technical aspects of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. I am known for my excellent problem-solving abilities and strong communication skills, which complement my technical proficiency.
responsibilities: Developing robust web applications using Django, Flask, React, and Vue.js

Conducting web scraping projects to gather and analyze data

Leading small teams and mentoring junior and plain members

en.description: At CryptoFuse.net, I pioneered a sleek cryptoswap platform using Django and JavaScript. Backed by PostgreSQL and deployed via Heroku. I've spearheaded both backend intricacies and frontend design with HTML & CSS.
